insults: Your combat skills are so pathetic, even slimes refuse to spawn near you!
You fight like a blindfolded toddler with a pool noodle!
I've seen NPCs with better AI than your decision-making!
Your attack pattern is more predictable than a rigged coin flip!
You're the reason difficulty settings have 'baby mode'!
Your defense stat must be in the negatives!
I've seen better performance from a game running on a potato!
You're the human equivalent of a critical failure!
Your battle strategy: spam buttons and pray to RNG!
Even tutorial enemies are too embarrassed to fight you!
You're about as threatening as a declawed kitten!
Your DPS is lower than my expectations for you!
I've taken more damage from stubbing my toe!
You make level 1 mobs look like raid bosses!
Your gear is trash, your stats are garbage, and your skill is non-existent!
You're the player everyone kicks from their party!
I've seen corpses with better reflexes!
Your combat record is more embarrassing than your browser history!
You're proof that pay-to-win still can't fix incompetence!
Your legend will be told as a cautionary tale of failure!
You're the reason servers have AFK timers!
Your playstyle makes NPCs question their programming!
You couldn't land a hit if I stood perfectly still!
Your combo broke worse than your parents' marriage!
You're getting carried harder than a newborn!
Even the game's code is ashamed of your performance!
You make griefing look like an improvement!
Your K/D ratio is lower than your IQ!
You're the walking embodiment of a rage quit!
